Elements.Name: isConsistentShadows
Description: Fixes the shadow consistency issues found in the original version of the 'Yoshi's Island Zone' DLC. Yoshis are exempt from this change.

Elements.Name: disablePipeTransition
Description: Changes the pipe transition from the DLC animation to a fade out. Recommended for playing in 21:9.

Groups.Name: ZeldaTweaks
Groups.DisplayName: The Legend of Zelda Zone Tweaks

Elements.Name: linkSonicPlayType
Description: Change where Link Sonic appears in the game.

Elements.Name: isLinkSonicFixed
Description: Fixes the materials inside Link Sonic's mouth (thanks to M&M: https://twitter.com/ActualMandM).

Elements.Name: isVirtualLinkSonic
Description: Changes the Virtual Sonics in multiplayer mode to Link Sonic with different costumes (thanks to GPF: https://twitter.com/GPF_SCT).
Elements.DisplayName: Play as Link Sonic in Multiplayer

Elements.Name: isAlwaysHeartLife
Description: Makes the game always use the heart system from 'The Legend of Zelda Zone' DLC.

Elements.Name: isStalbabyFixed
Description: Fix's the eye texture of the Stalbaby so there's no border around it.

Elements.Name: disableChestLetterboxing
Description:
Disables the letterboxing when opening a chest in 'The Legend of Zelda Zone' DLC.
Recommended for playing in 21:9.

Elements.Name: isRupeeCountInChestFixed
Description: Makes the game give the player the correct amount of rupees upon opening chests containing rupees in 'The Legend of Zelda Zone' DLC (By default there are no chests containing rupees in the DLC).
Only enables Link Sonic in The Legend of Zelda DLC.
Enables Link Sonic everywhere, including the world map and circus minigames.
Disables Link Sonic in The Legend of Zelda DLC.
